mapper.select: SELECT a.function_id as functionId FROM authorities a JOIN role_users r ON a.tenant_id=r.tenant_id AND a.role_id=r.role_id WHERE r.user_id=#{id} AND a.allow_deny=1 AND r.avaliable_date < now() AND r.unavaliable_date > now() AND a.api_yn=1
SELECT a.function_id as functionId FROM authorities a WHERE a.tenant_id=#{tenantId} AND a.allow_deny=1 AND a.api_yn=1

UPDATE users u SET u.update_count=u.update_count + 1, u.last_login_at=now() WHERE tenant_id=#{tenantId} AND sub=#{sub}
SELECT id FROM users WHERE tenant_id=#{tenantId} AND sub=#{sub}
mapper.select: SELECT tenant_id as tenantId, customer_id as customerId FROM customers_individual WHERE (name_kana_sei LIKE CONCAT('%',#{nameKanaSei},'%') OR name_kana_mei LIKE CONCAT('%',#{nameKanaMei},'%')) AND date_of_birth=DATE_FORMAT(#{dateOfBirth}, '%Y-%m-%d') AND sex=#{sex} AND addr_zip_code=#{postalCode}
